item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，Qwant 要求法国监管机构对微软采取临时措施
item.description: 直接了解此事的人士称，Qwant公司已要求法国反垄断监管机构对微软采取行动，指控微软通过必应平台降低了法国搜索引擎的搜索结果质量。【原文：Qwant has asked France's antitrust regulator to take action against Microsoft for allegedly driving down the quality of the French search engine's results via Microsoft's Bing platform, people with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: Capital One 必须面对社交媒体创作者指控佣金被盗的诉讼
item.description: Capital One 必须面对社交媒体创建者的诉讼，这些创建者称，该银行的免费浏览器扩展功能在消费者购买其产品和服务时窃取了他们的销售佣金。【原文：Capital One must face a lawsuit by social media creators who said the bank's free browser extension stole their sales commissions when consumers bought their products and services.】

item.title: 纽约联储宣布 2024 年债券持有量将出现 1.06 万亿美元未实现损失
item.description: 根据纽约联邦储备银行周二发布的一份报告，美联储去年在其持有的资产上出现了 1 万亿美元的未实现损失。【原文：The Federal Reserve saw $1 trillion in unrealized losses on its holdings last year, according to a report released Tuesday by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.】

item.title: 航空航天业警告美国新关税可能危及航空安全和供应链
item.description: 代表美国和全球主要航空航天公司的一个团体周二警告说，对进口商用飞机、喷气发动机和零部件征收新关税可能会危及航空安全和供应链，或产生意想不到的后果。【原文：A group representing major U.S. and global aeropsace companies on Tuesday warned new tariffs on imported commercial aircraft, jet engines and parts could put air safety and the supply chain at risk or have unintended consequences.】

item.title: 消息人士称，利洁时寻求新方案以推进 Air Wick 部门的出售
item.description: 英国利洁时公司（Reckitt）正在考虑新的方案，以推进出售其基本家居业务（Essential Home），该公司是 Air Wick 清新剂和 Cillit Bang 清洁剂的生产商。【原文：Britain's Reckitt is considering new options to advance a sale of its Essential Home business, home to Air Wick fresheners and Cillit Bang cleaners, after bids came in below expectations, two people with knowledge of the process said.】

item.title: Palantir 无惧科技界阴霾，特朗普势头推动股价大幅上涨
item.description: Palantir Technologies 今年在大多数科技股挣扎的领域取得了成功：在冷却的市场中保持热度。【原文：Palantir Technologies has succeeded where most tech stocks have struggled this year: staying hot in a cooling market.】

item.title: 美国 4 月份工厂订单下滑
item.description: 美国制成品的新订单在 4 月份大幅下降，企业的设备支出在第二季度伊始似乎失去了动力，因为在关税之前提前采购所带来的提振作用逐渐减弱。【原文：New orders for U.S.-manufactured goods dropped sharply in April and business spending on equipment appeared to have lost momentum at the start of the second quarter as the boost from front-loading of purchases ahead of tariffs faded.】

item.title: 所有者从周三起暂停 Pornhub、YouPorn 和 RedTube 在法国的业务
item.description: Pornhub、YouPorn 和 RedTube 背后的公司将从周三起暂停这些成人内容平台在法国的访问，有媒体称此举是为了抗议色情网站要求验证其用户是否年满 18 岁。【原文：The firm behind Pornhub, YouPorn and RedTube is suspending access to the adult content platforms in France from Wednesday, in a move that media said was in protest against a requirement for porn sites to verify that their users are 18 or older.】

item.title: 俄罗斯计划在空间站中集成国产人工智能模型
item.description: 俄罗斯航天局（Roscosmos）局长周二表示，俄罗斯计划将其自主研发的Gigachat人工智能模型集成到国际空间站（ISS）的IT系统中。【原文：Russia plans to integrate its homegrown Gigachat artificial intelligence model into IT systems on the International Space Station (ISS), the head of space agency Roscosmos said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国 4 月份职位空缺反弹；裁员人数回升
item.description: 美国 4 月份的职位空缺有所增加，但裁员人数回升，这与关税导致经济前景暗淡、劳动力市场放缓的趋势一致。【原文：U.S. job openings increased in April, but layoffs picked up in a move consistent with a slowing labor market amid a dimming economic outlook because of tariffs.】

item.title: 意大利努力重振落后的光纤铺设计划
item.description: 三位消息人士称，意大利政府推动国家支持的电信公司 Open Fiber 和 FiberCop 加快欧盟资助的网络计划的工作遇到了阻碍，因为这两家公司正在努力就潜在交易的条款达成一致。【原文：A push by Italy's government for state-backed telecoms firms Open Fiber and FiberCop to accelerate work on a European Union-funded network plan has hit a snag as the companies are struggling to agree terms of a potential deal, three sources said.】

item.title: 前 SpaceX 工程师的 Impulse Space 公司融资 3 亿美元扩充太空拖船队
item.description: Impulse Space 是一家开发轨道转移飞行器（俗称 "太空拖船"）的太空技术初创公司，在 Linse Capital 领投的一轮后期融资中筹集了 3 亿美元，使该公司的融资总额达到 5.25 亿美元。【原文：Impulse Space, a space technology startup developing orbital transfer vehicles commonly known as "space tugs," has raised $300 million in a late-stage funding round led by Linse Capital, bringing the company's total funding to $525 million.】

item.title: 消息人士称，5 月份对冲基金受助于股票，受阻于债券
item.description: 据消息人士和银行研究机构称，对冲基金在 5 月份因美元走软以及利用 4 月份全球贸易冲击后的市场混乱而获得收益，但在大宗商品和固定收益市场上却面临亏损。【原文：Hedge funds made gains in May on a weaker dollar and by exploiting market dislocations following April's global trade shock but faced losses in whipsawed commodities and fixed income markets, according to sources and bank research.】

item.title: 现任主管离职，摩根大通赋予消费者银行业务主管莱克更多职责
item.description: 周二的一份内部备忘录显示，摩根大通已让被广泛视为首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）潜在接班人的玛丽安-莱克（Marianne Lake）额外负责管理其海外消费者银行业务部门和战略发展办公室。【原文：JPMorgan Chase has given Marianne Lake, widely seen as a potential successor to CEO Jamie Dimon, the additional responsibility of managing its overseas consumer banking arm and strategic growth office, according to an internal memo on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克称当前的不确定性要求对利率政策保持耐心
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周二表示，强劲的经济让美国央行有时间权衡关税将如何影响通胀和经济增长，同时对今年晚些时候降息一次的可能性持开放态度。【原文：Atlanta Federal Reserve President Raphael Bostic said on Tuesday a strong economy gives the U.S. central bank time to weigh how tariffs will impact inflation and growth, while remaining open to the possibility of a single interest rate cut at some point later this year.】

item.title: 印尼承诺在六月谈判前向美国提供关税优惠
item.description: 印尼高级经济部长周三在会见美国贸易特使后表示，印尼已承诺在本月与华盛顿开始第二轮会谈前提供一份美国商品首选关税清单。【原文：Indonesia has committed to provide a list of preferred tariffs on U.S. goods before starting a second round of talks with Washington scheduled this month, its senior economy minister said on Wednesday after meeting the U.S. trade envoy.】

item.title: 福特汽车 5 月美国汽车销量增长 16
item.description: 福特汽车周二公布，受皮卡和跨界 SUV 需求的推动，5 月份美国汽车销量增长了 16%。【原文：Ford Motor on Tuesday reported a 16% rise in U.S. auto sales for May, aided by demand for pickup trucks and crossover SUVs.】

item.title: 科内利斯网络公司发布加速人工智能数据中心连接的技术
item.description: Cornelis Networks 周二发布了一套网络硬件和软件，旨在将多达 50 万个人工智能芯片连接在一起。【原文：Cornelis Networks on Tuesday released a suite of networking hardware and software aimed at linking together up to half a million artificial intelligence chips.】

item.title: 调查显示：特朗普关税引发美国企业对供应链的担忧
item.description: 保险经纪公司盖拉格（Gallagher）周二进行的一项调查显示，大多数美国企业主担心唐纳德-特朗普总统的全面关税措施会导致供应链中断。【原文：A majority of U.S. business owners are worried about supply chain disruptions from President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs, a survey by insurance brokerage Gallagher showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 博通推出最新网络芯片，加速人工智能发展
item.description: 博通公司（Broadcom）周二表示，该公司已开始交付旨在加速人工智能发展的最新网络芯片。【原文：Broadcom has begun to ship its latest networking chip that aims to speed AI, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空公司首席执行官预计全年将实现盈利，尽管定价方面仍有困难
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空公司首席执行官本-米尼库奇（Ben Minicucci）表示，在经济不确定性导致第一季度经济波动之后，该公司的预订量已趋于稳定，但定价能力尚未恢复。【原文：Alaska Airlines CEO Ben Minicucci said the company's pricing power has not recovered yet even as its bookings have stabilised following economic uncertainty that led to volatility in the first quarter.】

item.title: 诺福克南方公司董事长以个人原因辞职
item.description: 美国铁路运营商诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern）称，公司董事长克劳德-蒙乔（Claude Mongeau）周二以个人原因为由辞去了公司董事会职务。【原文：U.S. railroad operator Norfolk Southern said Chairman Claude Mongeau resigned from the company's board on Tuesday, citing personal reasons.】

item.title: 台湾继续就关税谈判与美国 "密切沟通
item.description: 台湾政府周二表示，台湾继续与美国就关税谈判进行 "密切沟通"，但目前无法提供更多信息。【原文：Taiwan continues to "communicate closely" with the United States on tariff talks, but cannot give more information at this point, the island's government said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道：游说团体警告：中国稀土出口限制有可能导致德国汽车生产停产
item.description: 德国汽车游说团体周二警告说，中国对稀土合金、混合物和磁铁的出口限制给汽车行业带来了严重风险，如果不能尽快找到解决方案，可能会导致生产延误和停产。【原文：Germany's auto lobby warned on Tuesday that export restrictions by China on rare earths alloys, mixtures and magnets posed a serious risk to the industry and could cause production delays and outages if a solution was not found quickly.】

item.title: 卡地亚报告部分客户数据在网络攻击中被盗
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一封电子邮件，历峰集团（Richemont）旗下的奢侈珠宝公司卡地亚（Cartier）告诉客户，其网站遭到黑客攻击，一些客户数据被盗。【原文：Cartier, the luxury jewellery company owned by Richemont had its website hacked and some client data stolen, it told customers according to an email seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 外交官和汽车制造商推动中国政府放宽稀土磁铁出口限制
item.description: 消息人士称，来自印度、日本和欧洲的外交官、汽车制造商和其他高管正在紧急寻求与中国政府官员会面，以推动加快稀土磁铁出口审批，因为稀土短缺有可能导致全球供应链停滞。【原文：Diplomats, automakers and other executives from India, Japan and Europe were urgently seeking meetings with Beijing officials to push for faster approval of rare earth magnet exports, sources said, as shortages threatened to halt global supply chains.】

item.title: 维多利亚的秘密称网络事件导致网站暂时关闭
item.description: 维多利亚的秘密（Victoria's Secret）周二披露，该公司检测到一起与信息技术系统有关的安全事件，导致这家内衣制造商在 5 月下旬暂时关闭其网站约三天。【原文：Victoria's Secret on Tuesday disclosed that it detected a security incident relating to information technology systems, which led to the lingerie maker temporarily shutting down its website for roughly three days in late May.】

item.title: 尽管绿色燃料备受质疑，航空公司仍坚持零净排放目标
item.description: 全球航空公司周二结束了为期两天的峰会，会议坚持到2050年实现净零排放的目标，但对更环保燃料和新飞机的可用性提出了新的担忧。【原文：Global airlines wrapped up a two-day summit on Tuesday sticking to a target of net zero emissions by 2050, but voicing fresh worries about the availability of greener fuels and new planes.】

item.title: 以色列网络创业公司 Zero Networks 获得 5500 万美元私人融资
item.description: 以色列网络安全初创公司 Zero Networks 周二表示，它在一轮中期私人融资中筹集了 5500 万美元，使迄今为止筹集的资金超过了 1 亿美元。【原文：Israeli cyber security startup Zero Networks said on Tuesday it raised $55 million in a mid-stage private funding round, bringing funds raised to date to more than $100 million.】

item.title: 美国 特朗普和习近平的重要谈话
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】
